author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Malaysia Airlines Brings Greater Deals at the Malaysia International Travel Mart (MITM)Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Malaysia Airlines Brings Greater Deals at the Malaysia International Travel Mart (MITM) Published on : Friday, August 14, 2015
In conjunction with the Malaysia International Travel Mart (MITM), Malaysia Airlines will be treating its customers to some irresistible travel deals via its website, www. malaysiaairlines.com beginning today until 17 August 2015.
Travelers will be able to enjoy some great bargains on Malaysia Airlines’ domestic and international routes for immediate travel until 31 March 2016.
Meanwhile, the national carrier will also be joining 60 other exhibitors beginning today till 16 August 2015 for the MITM at Mid Valley Exhibition Centre
Malaysia Airlines’ Senior Manager Regional Sales Malaysia, Kathleen Leong, said, “Take advantage of this special promotion and plan ahead your travels with your family and loved ones. This is the time for travellers to go out and about exploring the hidden gems of our homeground or travel abroad for a much needed vacation”
“If you are in the city, come and visit our booth at the Mid Valley Exhibition Centre and you will be spoilt for choice on our many exclusive travel deals. We will also be giving away return tickets to Tokyo, Hong Kong and Bangkok to some lucky draw winners during the exhibition,” added Kathleen.
